timeline.bodyText:
After https://github.com/eclipse/jkube/pull/402/files#r495933135
I think that you could remove the redundant configurations from the WatchContext.
The WatchContext should have the field for postGoalTask like
// private String postGoal; REMOVED
private Supplier<Boolean> postGoalTask;

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .postGoalTask(s -> MavenUtil.callMavenPluginWithGoal(project, session, pluginManager, s))
          
          
            
                            .postGoalTask(() -> MavenUtil.callMavenPluginWithGoal(project, session, pluginManager, watchPostGoal))

timeline.bodyText:
You are now using a Runnable instead of a Supplier<Boolean>.
But the MavenUtil#callMavenPluginWithGoal method created specifically for this tasks is still returning a boolean.
I'm not sure how important this return value is (why is it ignored in the former vs. why is it returned in the latter).
